Name: 异世界的无厘头生活
About the game: This is a short text game that tells the story of the protagonist's passing through the different world after his death In the beginning, you will meet a mysterious fat man who will take you to a different world And then you'll meet all kinds of girls who talk about life If you answer the wrong questions, you'll go to hell If you answer right, you can accomplish your life's great things The game English is translated by superfabs “Win + R”輸入steam
